name: Ace Triker
description:
(CLICK INSIDE THE WINDOW ONCE TO GET FOCUS; WASD+SPACE FOR CONTROLS AFTER THAT)

In the distant future, daring thrillseekers perform death-defying three-wheeled vehicular acrobatics while being chased by a pyrotechnic deathwall, all for the benefit of their adoring fans.

This isn't a task for an amateur biker. This is a job for an ACE TRIKER!

(Headphones recommended because dear god I made a theme song for this one too.)

All music made with Sentris. You too can make music!

(With special thanks to Jason & Lisa Oestreicher, Samantha Kalman and the great big extended giantbomb.com family!)

A "Low Performance" version has been added to the downloads for netbooks and other similar computers.

The game has now been updated to version 1.2, with many adjustments related to failure! Yay!

  • The Pyrotechnic Deathwall will now reliably toss you out
  • Dying in the Deathwall will toss all your trike's bits out
  • The camera keeps tracking your trike's core when you run out of armor, because that's pretty cool
  • If the core of your trike crosses the finish line before the game sends you to the game over screen, you'll enter the next shop with zero armor and have a single shot at buying more armor if there's some in stock (hopefully you won't get Vinny's store)
  • New helpful tips have been added

Version 1.1 updates:

  • S-Zero's beats take a little more time to charge, but are much easier to aim
  • Stunt points for all three characters' specials have been rebalanced, and now scale with their stats
